welcomeText:
Welcome to my blog about Web Development and Artificial Intelligence!

Here, I enthusiastically share my experiences and insights from these fascinating fields.

Discover exciting insights into the latest AI trends, useful tips for web development, and interesting reports about my journey from industrial clerk to aspiring data scientist. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or interested in how to combine business knowledge with IT skills - you're guaranteed to find inspiring content here.

Dive into my articles and join me on my path through the dynamic world of technology. Who knows, you might even discover new ideas for your own projects or your professional development!
